long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the ability to quickly copy LSI phrases A little green box appears in the top right corner taht allows to copy N LSI phrases at once on website https://just-magic.org/dmn/* (LSI phrases live view)
